entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. A few flurries near the British Columbia border in the morning. Local amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border.
